abstract: Rising Chicago rapper King L is among six people wounded in shootings across city.
lead_paragraph: A rising Chicago rapper was among six people wounded in shootings across the city on Wednesday, the police said.

headline.main: Illinois: Rapper Is Among Six Shot in Chicago
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Rapper Is Among Six Shot in Chicago
